comment.author: 67307569@N00
comment._content: Although the tags don't show it, this seems to also be Ludgate Circus, like the crowd scene photo elsewhere in this magnificent set, looking at the advertising on the building in the centre-right rear, with the front of St Paul's is visible above the "To-day" sign in the upper left: www.flickr.com/photos/nationallibrarynz_commons/3056448465/. The troops are marching up New Bridge Street from Blackfriars (off to the right) and turning into Fleet Street.

comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content:
Thanks so much for this info and the comments on the other photos in this set f0rbe5 - very much appreciated!

-- Courtney
